headline: Women Get All-Star Showcase, But No Award of Prize Money
abstract: Hoping to build on buzz from last year, the N.H.L. All-Star skills competition will add a U.S.A. vs. Canada three-on-three game.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. will introduce two new events at its All-Star skills competition on Friday in St. Louis. One involves its players attempting trick shots from an elevated platform in the stands. The other is a three-on-three exhibition featuring top womenâ€™s players, which, the league hopes, will be received as less of a novelty.
